channel.title: Comments on: I’m feeling very unlucky today

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/index.php/archives/1092/comment-page-1#comment-3089">peter</a>.
That's a disappointing work-around. Shouldn't need to be a work-around. :(
item.content:encoded:
In reply to peter.

That’s a disappointing work-around. Shouldn’t need to be a work-around. :(

item.title: By: Edwin Kanis
item.dc:creator: Edwin Kanis
item.description: Totally agree, played with it also, it's stupid you cannot remove the image. I do not understand this move.
item.content:encoded:
Totally agree, played with it also, it’s stupid you cannot remove the image.
I do not understand this move.

item.title: By: peter
item.dc:creator: peter
item.description: workaround, visit https://www.google.com/ or http://www.google.com/ncr. That works, but it still sucks
item.content:encoded: workaround, visit https://www.google.com/ or http://www.google.com/ncr. That works, but it still sucks
